#environment-ebay 
[![Build Status](https://ebayci.qa.ebay.com/CI-Instance/buildStatus/icon?job=environment-ebay)](https://ebayci.qa.ebay.com/CI-Instance/job/environment-ebay)  [![Dependency Status](https://nodevalid-i3ey5.vip.lvs01.dev.ebayc3.com/nodejs/environment-ebay.svg)](https://nodevalid-i3ey5.vip.lvs01.dev.ebayc3.com/nodejs/environment-ebay)  [![Code Coverage](https://nodevalid-i3ey5.vip.lvs01.dev.ebayc3.com/coverage/nodejs/environment-ebay)](http://sonar/dashboard/index?id=environment-ebay)


Environment selector for eBay.

## Changelog

See   [CHANGELOG.MD](https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/environment-ebay/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#changelog)

### Introduction

Use this module to make environment specific decisions in node apps.
This module uses `DEPLOY_ENV` environment variable to decide the environment.
`DEPLOY_ENV` are set by deploy scripts.

Possible values of `DEPLOY_ENV` are:

 - staging
 - sandbox
 - pre-production
 - production/secure
 - development
 - test

### Debugging
Some libraries may use `.isLocalDebug()` to detect if the node is running on a development machine but we want the process act like it is running on
DEPLOY_ENV env.

If a library DOES NOT check this value, this may not work.

For example in order to debug a process locally that is running in staging mode use:

```
rm -rf .beans .cache && NODE_ENV=staging DEPLOY_ENV=staging DEBUG_ON_DEV_MACHINE=true node index.js
```

### API

```javascript
    var deployEnv = require('@ebay/environment-ebay');

    deployEnv.isDev();          // if development environment
    deployEnv.isStage();        // if Stage/QA environment
    deployEnv.isQA();           // if Stage/QA environment
    deployEnv.isSandbox();      // if Sandbox environment
    deployEnv.isPreProd();      // if PreProd environment
    deployEnv.isProd();         // if Prod/Live environment
    deployEnv.isLive();         // if Prod/Live environment


    deployEnv.isNotDev();       // if not development environment
    deployEnv.isNotStage();     // if not Stage/QA environment
    deployEnv.isNotQA();        // if not Stage/QA environment
    deployEnv.isNotSandbox();   // if not Sandbox environment
    deployEnv.isNotPreProd();   // if not PreProd environment
    deployEnv.isNotProd();      // if not Prod/Live environment
    deployEnv.isNotLive();      // if not Prod/Live environment

    deployEnv.isLocalDebug();   // if DEBUG_ON_DEV_MACHINE=true


```
